description: AbstractTunnel is an abstract superclass representing the common attributes and associations of the classes Tunnel and TunnelPart.

properties.name: class
properties.description: Indicates the specific type of the Tunnel or TunnelPart.

properties.name: function
properties.description: Specifies the intended purposes of the Tunnel or TunnelPart.

properties.name: usage
properties.description: Specifies the actual uses of the Tunnel or TunnelPart.

properties.name: tunnelConstructiveElement
properties.description: Relates the constructive elements to the Tunnel or TunnelPart.

properties.name: tunnelInstallation
properties.description: Relates the installation objects to the Tunnel or TunnelPart.

properties.name: hollowSpace
properties.description: Relates the hollow spaces to the Tunnel or TunnelPart.

properties.name: tunnelFurniture
properties.description: Relates the furniture objects to the Tunnel or TunnelPart.

properties.name: lod1MultiSurface
properties.description: Relates to a 3D MultiSurface geometry that represents the Tunnel or TunnelPart in Level of Detail 1. Deprecated since CityGML 3.0.

properties.name: lod4MultiCurve
properties.description: Relates to a 3D MultiCurve geometry that represents the Tunnel or TunnelPart in Level of Detail 4. Deprecated since CityGML 3.0.

properties.name: lod4MultiSurface
properties.description: Relates to a 3D MultiSurface geometry that represents the Tunnel or TunnelPart in Level of Detail 4. Deprecated since CityGML 3.0.

properties.name: lod4Solid
properties.description: Relates to a 3D Solid geometry that represents the Tunnel or TunnelPart in Level of Detail 4. Deprecated since CityGML 3.0.

properties.name: lod4TerrainIntersectionCurve
properties.description: Relates to a 3D MultiCurve geometry that represents the terrain intersection curve of the Tunnel or TunnelPart in Level of Detail 4. Deprecated since CityGML 3.0.
